trans-unit.source: Represents session-state data for a session store.

The <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData> class is used by ASP.NET and implementers of a custom session-state store to pass session-state information to and from the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateModule>.
The <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData> class is used to represent session-state data for a session store to the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateModule>.

The <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData> object contains the session-state variable names and values, static object references, and <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData.Timeout%2A> information for the current session.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData"></xref> class.
The <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData> class is used to represent session-state data for a session store to the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateModule>.

The <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData> object contains the session-state variable names and values, static object references, and <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData.Timeout%2A> information for the current session.

The <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData> class is used by ASP.NET and implementers of a custom session-state store to pass session-state information to and from the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateModule>.

Custom session-store implementers construct a <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData> object in implementations of the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreProviderBase.GetItem%2A>, <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreProviderBase.GetItemExclusive%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreProviderBase.CreateNewStoreData%2A> methods.
The session variables and values for the current session.
The <xref href="System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollection"></xref> for the current session.
The <xref href="System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData.Timeout"></xref> for the current session.
The session variables and values for the current session.

The <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData.Items%2A> property references the session-state variables that are exposed to ASP.NET application code using the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState> class, which is accessed using the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> instance.
By default, session-state variables are managed using the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection> object.
Custom session-store implementers can supply their own implementation of the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateItemCollection> interface.
An <xref href="System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateItemCollection"></xref> object that contains variables and values for the current session.
Gets a collection of objects declared by `<object Runat="Server" Scope="Session"/>` tags within the ASP.NET application file Global.asax.
The
<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData.StaticObjects%2A> property is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP.

Custom session-store implementers can obtain a reference to the <xref:System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollection> class for the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> instance using the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility.GetSessionStaticObjects%2A> method.
Custom objects stored in the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData.StaticObjects%2A> collection must support binary serialization.
For more information, see [Binary Serialization](~/docs/framework/serialization/binary-serialization.md).
An <xref href="System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollection"></xref> containing objects declared in the Global.asax file.
Gets and sets the amount of time, in minutes, allowed between requests before the session-state provider terminates the session.
The time-out period in minutes.
